name: Formula Fuego
description:
The Game:

Formula Fuego is a classic cup-style racer, take your formula racer to the top through 8 cups in 6 locations! Go for podium every race or compete at your own pace enjoying the locales and music as you drive.

Features:

- 8 Cups to compete in!

- Car livery customization!

- Original Soundtrack/Score

- 6 Locations to see!  

Controls & Tips:

Simple WASD controls for your car.

Watch out for Oil spills and try to hit KERS pads for boost (because that is how KERS works this is a %100 authentic simulation of the KERS system).

Progress is automatically saved.

If you want to listen to the soundtrack on its own, here it is! 

https://soundcloud.com/piercestjames/sets/formula-fuego

Pierce St. James (JoyousCoconut)
